data.title: Trinity School of Midland
data.meta_description: Trinity's community supports the school through the Trinity Annual Fund, providing funds for equipment, faculty, learning opportunities, and financial aid.
data.text:
We count on Trinity School parents and grandparents, alumni and parents of alumni, trustees, faculty and staff, and friends to help us by investing in our students through the Trinity Fund Annual Campaign.

The Trinity Fund bridges the gap between tuition dollars and our modest endowment income to ensure our faculty receive competitive salaries, our children experience a wide array of learning opportunities and families in need receive support. The fund is a budgeted item and is forward funding, thereby directly impacting the operating budget for the following year. These gifts are unrestricted and support our students in tangible and measurable ways. Our goal is to achieve 100% participation.

Trinity School is a nurturing community inspiring students to reach for every bit of their potential as students, athletes, artists, leaders, and friends. Your contribution can be the investment that secures their future.

Please give to the Trinity Fund Annual Campaign today. It's simple, it's effective, and it is the one opportunity for each and every member of our community to unite and support our Mission.

Every gift makes a difference for our students!
